excerpt: The TMCM-1076 is an easy to use stepper motor driver unit with state of the art feature set. It is highly integrated and offers a convenient handling.The module is controlled via a step and direction interface. One configuration pin selects the current control mode between StealthChop™ for absolute silent motor control and SpreadCycle™ for high speed. A TTL UART interface allows for more advanced configuration and permanent parameter storage via TMCL™- IDE.All you need to get started is a power supply and Trinamic's free and easy to use TMCL-IDE. This graphical user interface allows quick setup and supports the use of commands in direct mode, monitors real-time behavior visualized in graphs, and logs and stores data.More about the TMCL-IDESpecial FeaturesMicroPlyer™CoolStep™SpreadCycle™StallGuard2™StealthChop™

Documentation: TMCL Firmware Manual FW V1.02 Rev 1.03
